title: Karuna Organic Shop
description: Karuna Society for Animals and Nature runs this organic shop which sells many product from its own organic farm; selection of vegetables, spices, grains; also house-made pesto and vegan butters. Located just off the main road, when coming out of the ashram, turn left on the main road, then right at the street intersecting Sai Towers Hotel, it's the last upper level shop on the left side next to N.Ahmed Tours & Travels.
streetAddress: side road, near Sai Towers Hotel
